ygData.subject: The Inventor, The Improver At Work(And Please, Don't Talk To Me About The Inflator From T:RW!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Wheeljack walked around the Alliance base for abit to see what it looked like.  After his small tour, he went to a room where he could do his work in

::Wheeljack::

           Wheeljack walked around the Alliance base for abi=
t to see what it looked like.  After his small tour, he went to a room wher=
e he could do his work in peace.  He saw a desk, and went over to it, he sa=
t down in the chair, which had wheels, so he could easily slide back and fo=
rth to get parts from another area.  This was so totally the life!!!!!  Him=
, sitting in his own quiet area, where he could do his job.  Wheeljack turn=
ed on the desklamp, and then slid over in his chair to a table, and rummage=
d through a box full ofjunk, bits and pieces of things he had collected on =
his travels to find the Alliance base.  He grabbed some stuff, and then whe=
eled back to his desk.  He put the parts under the desklamp, and started ma=
king something with them.

         "Ah, this will be a great weapon for th=
e Alliance once everyone has one, but for now, I am just making the very fi=
rst!" Wheeljack said, as he screwed around with the junk.

          An hou=
r and a half later, Wheeljack had made a gun.  The gun was white and black,=
 the barrel was long and slender.  But, he still needed something.  He had =
to get a special kind of ammunition for it, a special energy.  He walked do=
wn to the lab, and started looking around to see if he could find what he n=
eeded.

        "La dee da dee dum da dum-oh!  There we go!!!!" Wheeljack s=
aid, as he grabbed some pinkish-reddish liquid.  Then he walked down back t=
o his little workshop.  He grabbed a funny looking device, which was giving=
 off electricity.  He took a small portion of the liquid and put it in a te=
st tube.  Then he grabbed the strange device, and used it on the liquid in =
the test tube.  The liquid started to go all strange, and then Wheeljack pr=
essed a button on his device, and the liquid was now pinkish-reddish energy=
!!!  The button he pressed stopped the energy from making a short explosion=
.  Yes, it worked!!!  Now he took the other liquid that was left, and put i=
t into the gun.  He did the same thing with the liquid in the gun, he grabb=
ed his device and did his stuff.  

          "Yes!!!!  Yes!!!!!!!!  I pres=
ent to you, my newest weapon, the one and only, the Inflator!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
!!!!!!!!!!!" Wheeljack screamed to himself, maniacly.  He stopped, and then=
 took the Inflator.  Now he had to test it and make sure it really worked. =
 He took a balloon, but it wasn't blown up.  He took a clothespin and put i=
t on the part where you would normally blow air into it.  Then, he shot the=
 inflator multiple times at the balloon.  It was growing!!!!  It was growin=
g!!!!  Each shot from the inflator inflated the balloon!  Now, bots had som=
ething to either fear or laugh at.  Wheeljack had also added a secondary fi=
ring mode to the gun, which would instantly inflate something until it was =
near the point where it would pop.  He was proud of his new invention, but,=
 he now had two things to worry about, one minor, one major.  The minor was=
, getting this weapon to use by his comrades, the major was, Maximals or Pr=
edacons stealing his idea!!!  Although, stealing his idea would not be like=
 taking blueprints from a factory, they would have to have the requirements=
 and experience.  No one was as good as him!!!!!!!!!  He took the gun and l=
ooked for Zardus outside the base.

               "Hey, hey Zardus!!!!!!  =
I have a new gun created called the inflator!!  I was wondering if I could =
have someone make some copies of it for all the other members!" Wheeljack s=
aid, running towards Zardus, feeling proud while holding his invention.
